text:
CRM Implementation Specialist Freelancer Role:

Hi, I am looking for support in some deliverable’s I’m working through at the moment. It would be an hourly project to work through workflows, crm implementations, preparing training materials, and helping to test the system.

Additional experience in external 3rd party tools such as zapier would be beneficial but HubSpot only is ok too. I’m based in Australia so closer to this timezone would be great.
Hey Richard - My name is Ryan and I would like to be of assistance for you.  Sending you a DM now.
